patthana15.61:4.1: Sukhasahagataṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhasahagato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.61:4.2: Nasukhasahagataṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhasahagato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.61:4.3: Sukhasahagataṃ kusalañca nasukhasahagataṃ kusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhasahagato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.61:5.1: Sukhasahagataṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhasahagato naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.61:5.2: Nasukhasahagataṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhasahagato naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.61:5.3: Sukhasahagataṃ akusalañca nasukhasahagataṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhasahagato naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
